actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend Title 18 of the United States Code to make it a Federal crime to vandalize a house of worship or any religious articles therein.

summary.text: Amends the Federal criminal code to establish maximum criminal penalties of five years' imprisonment and/or a $10,000 fine for anyone who, with intent to interfere with any person freely exercising his religion, damages or destroys a religious house of worship or any religious object contained in such house.

titles.title: A bill to amend Title 18 of the United States Code to make it a Federal crime to vandalize a house of worship or any religious articles therein.
